game.name: Bayaya - Creator Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제
game.shortDescription: Bayaya Creator Pack is a powerful set of tools for creating and editing your own models, animations, and game worlds in Bayaya.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bayaya Creator Pack is a powerful set of tools for creating and editing your own models, animations, and game worlds in Bayaya.
